subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic's unbeaten run over the last 39 matches has included some notable victims: He has beaten Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer a total of seven times in that span.
snippet: Novak Djokovic's unbeaten run over the last 39 matches has included some notable victims: He has beaten Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer a total of seven times in that span.
